title: India's demand for electricity for ACs to exceed total power consumption of Africa: IEA
description: India's demand for electricity for household air conditioners is projected to increase nine-fold by 2050, surpassing the total power consumption of Africa today, according to the International Energy Agency (IEA). The IEA also stated that India will experience the highest energy demand growth of any country or region in the next three decades.
